hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit to the AAMI

Thank you for your interest in visiting the African American Museum of Iowa!

Enjoy the newly renovated AAMI building. Learn more about this major renovation project [here](https://blackiowa.org/vip). Explore our current exhibits, [ _Endless Possibilities_](https://blackiowa.org/collections-exhibits/permanent-exhibit/)and _[Rooted: Labor, Land,& Legacy.](https://blackiowa.org/collections-exhibits/rooted/) _

### Museum Hours

**Tuesday – Friday |** 12:00 PM – 4:00 PM

**Saturday |** 10:00 AM – 4:00 PM

The AAMI will be open on 1/19 from 10-4PM for MLK Day ($1 admission).

### Admission

**Adults |** $8

**Students |** $5

**Members and Children Under 5** | Free

Audio guides are available for  _Endless Possibilities_ for an additional $1

Enjoy $1 admission on the first Saturday of each month as part of our #NotJustFebruary programming.

### Location**  
**

55 12th Ave. SE  
Cedar Rapids, IA 52401  
(319) 862-2101

#### See [Nikee Museum Store](https://blackiowa.org/visit/nikee-museum-store/) merchandise.

#### Looking for a bite to eat?

The Czech Village/New Bohemia Main Street District website offers a business directory listing the many great places to eat in our neighborhood.

[See the Directory](https://crmainstreet.org/directory/)

### 

### We are a proud partner of 

FREE admission is available to SNAP benefit recipients for the remainder of 2025! Museums for All admission is available by presenting your EBT card and a valid photo ID. ...

collections_text:
The African American Museum of Iowa is the only statewide museum devoted to preserving African American history and culture. Our mission includes exhibiting and teaching the African American heritage of Iowa. We educate over 30,000 people each year through museum tours, traveling exhibits, research services, youth and adult education programs, and community and fundraising events. Explore our collection and exhibits that trace Iowa’s African American history from its origins to the present.
